title: GAME OF THRONES Season 8 Episode 2 Breakdown & Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment:
Who I think will die next episode:


Theon

Guess arya got 2 spears this episode. 


I'll see myself out 🚶
Is it bad that I actually want Brienne to end up with Tormund..? Tormund is just so silly, I love him! 😂

No one: 

Arya: stick me w the pointy end.

I get the feeling this episode was strictly used to ramp up our feeling for certain characters. Knowing that not all of them will survive it just strengthened the heartstrings. And I can’t stand the fact that we have to wait an entire week to see what happens. Great video, TS. Good stuff!
description:
We break down season 8 episode 2 "A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms" of HBO's hit fantasy series "Game of Thrones", exploring its ending and recapping some of the hidden details you may have missed along the way.
